name: Save the Frog Keita
description:
1. This game is to help the frog Kata and his friends escape from a dangerous area.
2. In the game, all you need to do is click the mouse, create a leaf, give frogs a fulcrum, and help them escape from dangerous areas.
3. As your abilities increase, the number of frogs you need to save will also increase.
4. The game is simple, medium, and difficult. It is recommended that players start with simplicity.
